description: I guess these are the commands you can use to talk to me...

fields.name: $diss signup
fields.value: This is step 1 if you haven't done this yet dumb dumb.

fields.name: $diss register {game title} {in-game username}
fields.value: You should probably let me know what game you play and your user name.

fields.name: $diss roast {game title} {discord nickname}
fields.value: I'll tell you how bad you or your friends did in your last match.

fields.name: $diss {game title} {in-game username}
fields.value: I'll give my nicest opinion of this persons last match.

fields.name: $diss help
fields.value: If I really need to explain what this does, you need more help than I can give...
